backend/main.mo: Backend actor providing user profiles, radio stream checks, push subscriptions, and request storage with permission enforcement via AccessControl.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature requirements, involved components, and associated files for updates to background images and service worker caching.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Mapping of frontend file paths to short descriptions summarizing their functionality and recent updates.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_DEBUG.md: Notes on a failed frontend TypeScript build caused by Node.js typings in browser code, including affected lines.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point defining meta tags, manifest links, Google Cast SDK, and a recovery UI for React mount timeouts.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining metadata, icons, theme colors, categories, and shortcuts for the Mawalking Radio app.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing cache versioning 4.6, aggressive cache cleanup, background asset caching, and push notification handling.
frontend/README-verify.md: Guide describing how to run the frontend verification script to catch build issues before deployment.
frontend/scripts/verify-frontend.mjs: Node script that verifies TypeScript config, checks for NodeJS.Timeout usage, validates background asset paths, and inspects service worker settings.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing navigation, audio playback, state initialization, and global providers.
frontend/src/components/CastControl.tsx: Chromecast control button that starts or stops casting and shows status feedback.
frontend/src/components/InstallPrompt.ts: PWA installation prompt handling platform detection, deferred install events, and install guides.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Renders a fixed bottom navigation bar with tabs and icons, updating the active tab on selection.
frontend/src/components/player/MiniPlaye: Shows a compact audio player with artwork, marquee title, and play/pause control that opens a full player when tapped.
frontend/src/components/player/TrackTitl: Implements a scrolling marquee for track titles with motion preferences, pause interactions, and dynamic measurement logic.
frontend/src/components/player/VolumeSli: Provides a slider UI to control and sync audio element volume.
frontend/src/components/PushNotification: UI panel for enabling and showing the status of web push notification subscriptions.
frontend/src/components/RequestForm.tsx: Dialog form allowing users to submit song or shout‑out requests to the backend.
frontend/src/components/ServiceWorkerRec: Banner prompting users to refresh or reset when service worker errors or updates occur.
frontend/src/components/ShareButton.tsx: Share button using Web Share API with a fallback dialog for copying the app link.
frontend/src/components/shows/ShowCard.t: Displays show info with image, description, genres, and schedule in a clickable card.
frontend/src/components/status/LiveBadge: Renders a red animated LIVE badge with an icon.
frontend/src/components/status/OnAirIndi: Shows a pulsing dot to indicate on-air status.
frontend/src/components/TrackNotificatio: Displays a styled notification for track events with icons, colors, and optional dismiss handling.
frontend/src/data/mockShows.ts: Defines the Show interface and provides mock show data for display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAlbumArtBackground: Empty file placeholder for album art background hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppLifecyclePlayba: Handles auto-resuming audio playback when the app regains visibility or focus, with fallbacks when manual resume is needed.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackgroundImageDia: Checks if the body background image successfully loads and logs a warning or success after a delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useChromecast.tsx: Manages Chromecast availability, initialization, session handling, casting state, and errors for a given stream URL.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavoriteStation.ts: Tracks and toggles a favorite station flag in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity login, logout, identity persistence, and status tracking using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarqueeMeasurement: Measures container and text widths to determine overflow and compute marquee animation properties with retries and remounting logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Handles notification permissions, detects track/mix/live changes, deduplicates alerts, and triggers browser notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/usePushSubscription.t: Manages push subscription creation, permission requests, backend registration, and unsubscribe flow using a service worker and VAPID keys.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for stream URL retrieval with fallback, stream availability checks, now playing data, and submitting requests.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceWorkerRegis: Manages service worker registration, update handling, reset logic, and exposes state and update actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useSleepTimer.ts: Implements a sleep timer that pauses audio after a countdown with start and cancel controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Handles acquiring and releasing screen wake locks during active playback with visibility-based re-requesting.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, and responsive background images with light/dark support.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, rendering the root component.
frontend/src/screens/BrowseShowsScreen.t: Renders a filterable list of shows using genre and day selectors and navigates on show selection.
frontend/src/screens/HomeLiveScreen.tsx: Live listening screen showing station header, now-playing info, and a stateful play/pause button with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/screens/NowPlayingScreen.ts: Expanded now‑playing view with album art, track metadata, playback controls, volume slider, and optional sleep timer.
frontend/src/screens/SettingsAboutScreen: Settings and about page providing notification controls and a tool to refresh cached background images.
frontend/src/screens/ShowDetailScreen.ts: Displays detailed info for a show with image, schedule, genres, description, and calendar‑add functionality.
Startup diagnostics utility that collects early load errors and displays an overlay if critical issues occur.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Google Analytics helper functions for safe gtag event tracking including play, pause, and cast events.
frontend/src/utils/ics.ts: Generates an ICS calendar file for a show by computing next occurrence and triggering a file download.
frontend/src/utils/normalizeArtworkUrl.t: Normalizes artwork URLs, converting relative or protocol-relative paths to HTTPS and validating absolute URLs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, screens, animations, plugins, and theme extensions.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata, feature definitions, requirements, and background image asset specifications.
